data.name: 3 DAYS: Ghosts of War
data.detailed_description:
3DAYS: Ghosts of War is a paragraph-based text game driven by time pressure and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination! You choose the direction in which the adventure will unfold. But remember - you only have 3 days...

  • Text game where you choose the direction in which you lead the main character.
  • Time pressure - when you play, time is running. When you make choices, you lose a certain amount of time.
  • You can pause the game at any time.
  • Afghanistan and war atmosphere.
  • Multiple endings.

data.short_description: You wake up... Afghanistan. You have 3 days . It's only 72 hours ... for the realize the mission. Immerse yourself in a dynamic and surprising real time adventure game, manage your time, find all game endings. Ghost's fate is in your hands...
